title: Bug 10593: Jar export should add ".jar" suffix if not specified
description: When exporting files using the jar export feature in Build 20020228, if the user enters a jar name without the ".jar" suffix, the exported jar file is created without the suffix. This causes confusion and inconsistency with expected behavior. The jar export should automatically add the ".jar" suffix if not specified by the user.
OB: Build 20020228: Select some files and export them using the jar export feature. Enter "test" as the jar name. The exported jar file is created with the name "test" instead of "test.jar".
SR: Build 20020228: Select some files and export them using the jar export feature. Enter "test" as the jar name. The exported jar file should be created with the name "test.jar" to match the expected behavior.
